name: Jia-Huai You
content: Jia-Huai You Jia-Huai You Professor, Ph.D. (1985, University of Utah) Office: Athabasca Hall 3-54; email: jyou at ualberta.ca Here is me Research Interests: Artificial Intelligence, Knowledge Representation and Reasoning, Logic Programming, Nonmonotonic Reasoning Research Knowledge Representation | Answer Set Programming | Constraint Programming Publications Recent Courses Cmput 325 : Nonprocedural Programming Languages Cmput 204 : Algorithms I Cmput 620 : Knowledge Representation and Reasoning with Answer Set Programming Marks Database (docsdb) Academic Calendar Additional Links Department of Computing Science Website | University of Alberta Website
